item.title: Navigating the Trenches: A Guide to Effortlessly Handling Customer Support Tickets
item.description: If you work with real data and customers you will have to deal with customer support tickets. This is a very important part of your business and you should take it seriously. In this article, I will give my lessons learned and some tips on how to handle customer support tickets. What is a customer support ticket? A customer support ticket is a question, a bug report, a feature request or a complaint coming from a customer of your product.
